appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Toggle pin tab, duplicate tab, mute tab and more in your custom keyboard shortcuts

newTabWithUrl.message: Open copied URL in a new tab

newQueryWithSelected.message: Search for selected text or URL in a new tab

independent.message: Move current tab to a new window

previousTabInSameWindow.message: Go back to the previous tab of current window

previousTabLastWindow.message: Go back to the previous tab of last window

keepSameDomain.message: Only keep the same domain tabs

killOtherSameDomain.message: Close tabs from the same domain other than current tab

prevent_clost_tab_splash1.message: Just leave this tab open and your browser won't be closed automatically

prevent_clost_tab_splash2.message: NOTE: Due to a change in the API of Chrome, you will need to click anywhere on this page once or press any alphabet key to make this script work

prevent_clost_tab_splash3.message: CLICK ANYWHERE or press any alphabet key$brtag$BACK TO LAST TAB (OR NEW TAB OR YOU MOVED HERE)

prevent_clost_tab_splash4.message: How to disable/enable: You will find the option by clicking the extension icon

newQueryWithPasted.message: Search for copied text in a new tab

features2.message: For more commands, please go to the keyboard shortcut settings page

features.message: pin: alt + 1,duplicate: alt + 3,open copied text: ctrl + shift + v,search for copied text: ctrl + shift + v,search for selected text,move a tab to a new window,open notepad in Chrome,mute current tab,mute other tabs,only keep the same domain tabs

popup_splash_prevent_close_tab_toolip.message: A tab for preventing the window from closing without user's confirm will be created automatically on the new window

go_shortcut_setting.message:
Go to set shortcuts
(Please scroll to Lazy Chrome section)
